Pretty neat man you should do a video of how linear can cause a greater increase or a smaller increase similarly exponential can gain a smaller or larger boost as well.

10 increasing by 10 everyday after 10 days is 100 in a linear manner

10 increasing by 10% everyday for 10 days is 23.5794691 in an exponential manner.


It could also be that it increases by a factor of 10 each day and thus exponentially it would be 10 billion.
